docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 12. -- Exports in June, which are valued at $184,908,000, increased to all the grand divisions except Southern North America. They compared with $170,244,000 in June last year, the Department of Commerce announced today.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 12. -- Exports in June, which are valued at $184,908,000, increased to all the grand divisions except Southern North America. They compared with $170,244,000 in June last year, the Department of Commerce announced today.

headline.main: EXPORTS GO HIGHER BUT TRAIL IMPORTS; U.S. Sales Better to All Grand Divisions Except Southern North America. JUNE VALUE $184,908,000 Adverse Balance Continues in Foreign Trading in Month and Half Year. EXPORTS GO HIGHER BUT TRAIL IMPORTS

docs.snippet: GRUNAU, Germany, Aug. 13. -America demonstrated conclusively in today's rowing that it has nothing to offer in the Olympic finals tomorrow but the Washington eight and the single-sculler, Daniel Barrow Jr. of Philadelphia, who will probably make a...
docs.lead_paragraph: GRUNAU, Germany, Aug. 13. -America demonstrated conclusively in today's rowing that it has nothing to offer in the Olympic finals tomorrow but the Washington eight and the single-sculler, Daniel Barrow Jr. of Philadelphia, who will probably make a three-way fight of it with Switzerland's E. Rufli and Germany's Gustav Schafer.

headline.main: Germany Leads in Olympic Rowing as U.S. Fares Poorly in Consolation Round; U.S. SCULLERS GAIN FINALS AT GRUNAU

docs.snippet: BERLIN, Aug. 14. -- The Olympic basketball tournament ended tonight with an American victory over Canada by 19 -- 8. As a result the United State became the gold medalist and Canada automatically the silver medalist. Mexico took the bronze from...
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Aug. 14. -- The Olympic basketball tournament ended tonight with an American victory over Canada by 19 -- 8. As a result the United State became the gold medalist and Canada automatically the silver medalist. Mexico took the bronze from Poland with a 26-12 triumph in a match played Just before the final.

headline.main: U.S. FIVE ANNEXES FINAL BATTLE, 19-8; Takes First Olympic Crown, Routing Canada in Rain and a Sea of Mud. SPORT NOW WORLD GAME But American Supremacy Stays Unchallenged -- Mexico Takes 3d -- Philippines Win.

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 14. -- The French passenger steamer Eubee and the British cargo steamer Corinaldo collided in a fog early this morning off Cape Mostardas, 106 miles north of Rio Grando do Sul, Brazil. The Eubee's 200 passengers and 36 of the crew...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 14. -- The French passenger steamer Eubee and the British cargo steamer Corinaldo collided in a fog early this morning off Cape Mostardas, 106 miles north of Rio Grando do Sul, Brazil. The Eubee's 200 passengers and 36 of the crew were safely transferred to the Corinaldo, which is standing by the disabled passenger vessel until the arrival of aid.
docs.abstract: Eubee (SS) and SS Corinaldo damaged in crash off Cape Mostardas, Brazil; passengers removed to Corinaldo

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
